Linux

Top 3 Beginner-friendly Linux distributions you can easily install right now.

last updated January 24, 2019 in Linux

Are you fraustrated with the Windows updates, various issues and decide to try out Linux OS? But wait, which distro (distribution) or which desktop environment? I suggest you to try out Linux on your Windows machine with Virtualbox and decide yourself which distribution you suits your needs. Below are some Linux distributions from the thousands, which I believe to be the best, you can try and decide.
